name: Sample Set
description:
Unsure of what to get because you've never tried Reciprocitee before?  Well, this sample set is a great option for you because you get a chance to sample our most popular items for a low price!  This is a great gift idea as well:) The set Includes:

4 oz. worth of Soap Bar samples

1 oz. Body Butter (Unscented, Nature, Engedi, Or Rugged)

.15 oz Face Mask (Good for 1 application or multiple spot treatments)

.05 oz. Lip Balm (Peppermint or Lavender)

.25 oz. Body Scrub *added to the set 8/5/13

Do you have a wedding, bridal or baby shower coming up and would like a nice gift for your guest?  Consider buying in bulk!  All items are handmade and nicely packaged:)  Just email myreciprocitee@gmail.com to discuss availability

1-20= $12 e/
21-49= $9 e/
50-99 = $6 e/
100+= $4 e/

Please Note that all items are natural and handmade, therefore color and texture may slightly vary per batch but the quality is still the same!

*If you live in Atlanta, GA you can purchase select items at The Beehive!  It's located at 1250 Caroline St. Suite C120 Atlanta, GA 30307.  Feel free to call ahead of time to find out if what you want is in stock at (404) 581-9261 OR enter the code "LOCALPICKUP" at checkout to pick up items not available at The Beehive

name: Full Body Set
description:
If you've already tried the Sample Set, you know that you love all that Reciprocitee has to offer, so why not get everything FULL SIZED!  This can be a great gift to yourself or for a loved one:)  In this gift set you will find

.15 oz Lip Balm
4 oz. Face Mask
4 oz. Body Butter
4 oz. Soap Bar
8 oz. Body Scrub

*specify your lip balm scent, body butter scent and soap scent in the Paypal notes section.

This $55 value is available for $45 so what do you have to lose? Quality products at an affordable price!


*If you live in Atlanta, GA you can purchase select items at The Beehive!  It's located at 1250 Caroline St. Suite C120 Atlanta, GA 30307. name: Body Butter Sample Set
description:
Enjoy (5) .25 oz. Body Butter Samples if you are unsure of what is best for you.  You are bound to discover a favorite or two out of the bunch or can give them out to your friends!

INGREDIENTS: Raw Shea Butter, Organic Cocoa Butter, Jojoba Oil, Coconut Oil, Almond Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Aloe Vera, Natural Vitamin E, Grapefruit Seed Extract & Essential Oils OR Fragrance.

UNSCENTED: 100% natural butter for him and her

NATURE:100% natural lightly scented with essential oils for him and her

ENGEDI: Musky fragrant butter for her

RUGGED (aka RAW): Masculine & clean fragrant butter for him

TROPICAL NECTAR: A fragrance reminiscent of the fresh fruit and flowers in a Tropical Rainforest. (Only available during Spring/Summer.  The Winter/Fall scent will be available during Winter/Fall)

Please Note that all items are natural and handmade, therefore color and texture may slightly vary per batch but the quality is still the same!

name: Bye Bye Blemish Duo
description:
Reciprocitee's 4 oz. Intoxicating Detox Soap Bar and 1 oz. Face Mask make a great team to combat Acne, oily and temperamental skin!  This duo will bring you closer to a better complexion...Can be used on face and body!

BENEFITS of Detox Soap Bar: Detergent free and moisturizing. Therefore great for normal to dry, eczema prone skin! Can be used on face and body... All Natural, Coconut Oil base soap!  Made with Tomato Powder and Bamboo Activated Charcoal. Promotes healthy skin by moisturizing and absorbing impurities.  Also great to use to cleanse the face when you're is prone to breakouts. (Avoid use during pregnancy)

BENEFITS of Face Mask: For Oily skin...Gently detoxifies. Can be used on entire face or to spot check your problem areas (blemishes)

*If you live in Atlanta, GA you can purchase select items at The Beehive!  It's located at 1250 Caroline St. Suite C120 Atlanta, GA 30307.  Feel free to call ahead of time to find out if what you want is in stock at (404) 581-9261 OR enter the code "LOCALPICKUP" at checkout to pick up items not available at The Beehive

name: 3 Soap Sampler
description:
5 oz. worth of 3 of 4 soaps that I currently offer will be sent to you in this 3 soap Sampler (Lavender, Poppymint, Intoxicating Detox Soap Bars or Tropical Nectar) *selection varies

BENEFITS: Detergent free and moisturizing. Therefore great for dry, eczema prone skin! Great for face and body...All Natural Coconut Oil soap base for the whole family!

POPPYMINT: Made with Poppyseeds and Mint for a gentle exfoliation and skin clarity. Softens skin and promotes freshness.

LAVENDER SKIES: A lightly scented lavender bar that makes shower time a little more relaxing. Moisturizing to skin.

INTOXICATING DETOX: Made with Tomato Powder and Bamboo Activated Charcoal. Promotes healthy skin by moisturizing and absorbing impurities. Also great to use to cleanse the face when you're prone to breakouts.  (Avoid use during pregnancy)

INGREDIENTS: Sodium Cocoate (fatty acids of Coconut Oil), Sodium Palmate (fatty acids of Palm Oil), Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Water, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea butter), Sorbitol, Sorbitan Oleate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Protein, Titanium Dioxide, Kaolin Clay, *Assorted Powders & Essential Oils

*Bamboo Activated Charcoal and Tomato Powder (Intoxicating Detox Bar)

*Ultramarine Pink & Blue Oxide (Lavender Skies)

*Rosemary Powder (PoppyMint Bar)


Please Note that all items are natural and handmade, therefore color and texture may vary slightly per batch but the quality is still the same!


*If you live in Atlanta, GA you can purchase select items at The Beehive!  It's located at 1250 Caroline St. Suite C120 Atlanta, GA 30307.  Feel free to call ahead of time to find out if what you want is in stock at (404) 581-9261 OR enter the code "LOCALPICKUP" at checkout to pick up items not available at The Beehive

description:

name: Body Butter (Multiple Sizes)
description:
Available in 2 oz., 4 oz., 8 oz., & 1lb.

Made with Natural ingredients!

BENEFITS:  Fully nourishing to the skin...this rich lusciousness rubs on like butter and can be used for your hair as well! You have your choice of a 100% natural butter that is either unscented or scented with essential oils.  You can also choose a fragrant body butter that is lightly scented with fragrance oils.   Can be applied to dry or damp skin and hair depending on your preference!  Leaves hair feeling soft and conditioned while your skin is left soft, moisturized and smelling amazing...a little goes a long way bc this is not an airy, fluffy mixture...again, its RICH & Luscious

*I personally use the butter on my skin AND apply to dry hair, followed with the greenhouse effect or a light steam treatment:). I keep my regimen simple and this works for me!

INGREDIENTS: Raw Shea Butter, Organic Cocoa Butter, Jojoba Oil, Coconut Oil, Almond Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Aloe Vera, Natural Vitamin E, Grapefruit Seed Extract & Essential Oils OR Fragrance.

UNSCENTED: 100% natural butter for him and her

NATURE:100% natural lightly scented with essential oils for him and her

ENGEDI: Musky fragrant butter with vanilla undertones for her

RUGGED (aka RAW): Masculine & clean fragrant butter for him

TROPICAL NECTAR: Captures the amazing scents of the Tropics so nicely...fruits and florals captivate your senses with this yummy smelling butter.  You will surely be tempted to take a bite:)

Do you have a wedding, bridal or baby shower coming up and would like a nice gift for your guest?  Consider buying 1 oz. samples in bulk!  All items are handmade and nicely packaged:)  Just email myreciprocitee@gmail.com to discuss availability

name: Cradle Cap Trio
description:
Made with 100% natural ingredients

Cradle Cap Trio Includes (2 oz. Healing Butter, 2 oz. Calming Rinse, & a Stimulating Brush) Good for 2 powerfully effective scalp treatments to completely get rid of your babies irritated scalp.

BENEFITS: This Cradle Cap Trio is GUARANTEED to provide relief to your babies infected scalp.  The nourishing balm will help loosen the build up and effectively bring stimulation to the area.  While the rinse with effectively sooth any irritation to the sensitive scalp.  After ONE proper application your baby can be completely free of an irritated, scabbed scalp!  Any remaining product can be used for spot checks IF necessary.

INGREDIENTS: 

-Healing Butter: Raw Shea Butter, Organic Cocoa Butter, Organic Coconut Oil, Jojoba Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Almond Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Aloe Vera, Natural Vitamin E, Grapefruit Seed Extract, & Essential Oils

-Calming Rinse- Witch Hazel, Pure Baking Soda & Essential Oils

*avoid use due to sensitivity/allergies

name: Mens Shaving Set (w/ wooden Soap Dish)
description:
Reciprocitee makes sure to offer something for men as well!  This Men's Shaving Set is suited for Kings!  A man needs to treat himself and unwind sometimes with a gift such as this.  The smell of lavender is calming to the senses and is excellent for getting the job done.  A little goes a long well and will leave you looking well groomed, smelling nice and feeling refreshed is it eases skin irritation!  Included are the following:

1/2 oz. Lavender Scented Pre Shave Oil
4 oz. Lavender Scented Shave Bar
2 oz. Lavender Scented After Shave Cream
Wooden Soap Dish to preserve your Shave Bar


*PRE SHAVE OIL*

Made with Natural Ingredients

BENEFITS: Preps the skin and softens head/facial hair for a smoother shave.

INGREDIENTS:  Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, & Essential Oils


*SHAVE BAR*

Made with Natural Ingredients

BENEFITS: Produces a great lather and is created to last, so a little goes a long way! Comes in a great size to hold in your hand comfortably.

INGREDIENTS:  Organic Coconut Oil, Organic Palm Oil, Kosher Glycerine, Sodium Hydroxide, Purified Water, Sorbitol, Sorbitan Oleate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Protein,  Herbs, Brown Oxide & Essential oils


*AFTER SHAVE CREAM*

Made with Natural ingredients:

BENEFITS:  Experience a long lasting ultra soothing & moisturizing feeling. Smells incredible too!

INGREDIENTS: Aloe Vera, Mango Butter, Shea Butter, Sweet Almond Oil, Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, Grapefruit Seed Extract, Natural Vitamin E & Essential Oils

*Avoid use due to sensitivity/allergies

Please Note that all items are natural and handmade, therefore color and texture may slightly vary per batch but the quality is still the same!
